text: Mazima abo abalangirira obuwagizi bwabwe gyoli mazima balangirira buwagizi bwabwe eri Katonda, omukono gwa Katonda guli waggulu wa mikono gya bwe, kale nno oyo anaamenya endagaano mazima mukugimenya aba yeefiriza yekka, nooyo atuukiriza ekyo kye yaweerako Katonda obweyamu ajja kumuwa empeera ensuffu
